creator: CASUAL AZUR GAMES
descriptionHtml:
Kick opponents and knock them out with curved punch or your leg.
Use joystick to avoid punches from your opponents. Be the king of the arena
descriptionShort: knock them out with curved punch
title: Poppy Punch

creator: CASUAL AZUR GAMES
descriptionHtml:
Kick opponents and knock them out with curved punch or your leg.
Use joystick to avoid punches from your opponents. Be the king of the arena
descriptionShort: knock them out with curved punch
title: Poppy Punch

creator: CASUAL AZUR GAMES
descriptionHtml:
Poppy Punch is a Poppy fighter game! Knock everyone out of the ring with a curved fist. Only one can be the winner!

You and the other rivals are Poppy. All fighters will meet face to face in the ring, and every man will fight for himself! Your task is to knock out all opponents and remain the last in this arena!
Each Poppy has health points, you can win if you take all of them, or knock the enemy out of the ring. For each defeated opponent, your level will become higher, the punch is stronger and longer! Be careful as enemies can crowd in!

If you're ready to become the Poppy champion, push everyone out of the arena, or punch everyone out, this is the battle for you! The rules are pretty simple, but winning in the ring is not easy at all. Knock out all enemies and remain the last fighter among Poppy.

Poppy Punch Features:

- Simple joystick controls
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Each fight is unique
- Excellent game mechanics
- Fun gameplay

Punch everyone in the ring and then you can become the Poppy champion! Join the battle and win!

=====================
COMPANY COMMUNITY:
=====================
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AzurGamesOfficial
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/azur_games
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/AzurInteractiveGames

creator: CASUAL AZUR GAMES
descriptionHtml:
Poppy Punch is a Poppy fighter game! Knock everyone out of the ring with your sharp punch. There can be only one winner!

You and the other rivals are Poppy. All fighters will meet face to face in the ring, and every one will fight for themselves! Your task is to knock out all opponents and remain the last standing character in this arena!
Each Poppy has health points, you can win if you take them all away, or knock the enemy out of the ring. With each defeated opponent, you get a new level and your punch becomes stronger and its range increases as well! But be careful as enemies can crowd you!

If you're ready to become the Poppy champion, push everyone out of the arena, or beat everyont till they loose all HP, this battle is meant for you! The rules are pretty simple, but winning in the ring is not easy at all. Knock out all enemies and remain the last fighter among Poppy.

Poppy Punch Features:

- Simple joystick controls
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Each fight is unique
- Excellent game mechanics
- Fun gameplay

Punch everyone in the ring and then you can become the Poppy champion! Join the battle and win!
